title: Around the Day in Eighty Worlds
description: Around the Day in Eighty Worlds includes book reviews, travel pieces, short stories, poetry, and appreciations of jazz artists like Clifford Brown, Thelonious Monk, and Louis Armstrong. There is also quite a lot about Cortázar’s cat, whose name was Theodor W. Adorno.A lot of his thoughts and likings taped together.
author: Julio Cortázar
